## How to add courses to my favourites?

Andy has found some courses that he is interested in, and he wants to add
these courses to his favourite list for later learning. Now let’s see how Andy
will add a course to his favourite list in Curricula.

1\. When viewing the details of a course, Andy is interested in the course.

2\. On the **Course details** page, Andy clicks the Add to favourites button
in the upper-right corner.

3\. In the **Add to favourites** window, he can select the default favourite
list.

4\. If Andy wants to create a new favourite list, he can click the Create
button, and then create a list in **My profile** > **Favourite courses**.

In **My profile** > **Favourite courses** , Andy can view all his favourite
courses, manage his favourite lists, and manage courses in lists.
